assign

public Tx_Extbase_MVC_View_ViewInterface assign(string $key, object $value)

Add a variable to $this->viewData.
Can be chained, so $this->view->assign(..., ...)->assign(..., ...); is possible,

Parameters

$key - Key of variable
$value - Value of object

assignMultiple

public void assignMultiple(array $values)

Add multiple variables to $this->viewData.

Parameters

$values - array in the format array(key1 => value1, key2 => value2).

Initializes this view.
